Banner.Description: I have 1 year of experience developing REST API's using ASP.NET Core API & MVC, Angular to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and ASP.NET applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hello I am a passionate Full Stack .NET developer, I have a 1 year of Work Experience . I do Frontend development using Angular , and covering backend developer roles with ASP.NET Core MVC & API. I am Passionate about Collaborating with Teams.
My skills also include implementing Clean,Robust,Reusable and High Quality Code.

Some of the technologies that I have learnt and worked on include: HTML,CSS,Javascript,Typescript,Angular,ASP.NET Core MVC & API,SQL Server, Git,Github,Bootstrap,Material UI,Scrum,REST API,Postman,Visual Studio,Visual Studio Code,SQL S
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Javascript developer
Description: Creation and Implementation of features to detect Plagarism  and Trending topic for blogging.
Creation of automated text generation for specified topic name using AI.
Collaborated with the Team of Developers to write clean and robust code.
Planning and implementing features according to the product team.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack .Net developer
Description: Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Developed efficient and maintainable back-end components using C# and the .NET framework, ensuring seamless integration with front-end functionalities.
Actively participated in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and implementing suggested improvements to enhance the overall code quality.
Contributed to the development of RESTful APIs to facilitate smooth communication between the front-end and back-end systems.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CryptoSteller
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A Crypto Currency app , with realtime weather by city names. It tracks realtime crypto currency prices and their exchange rates with USD .

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: ECourtFlow
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: ECourtflow is a dynamic judiciary management system for both advocates and judges to reduce unnecessary delay from hearing and smooth delievering of justice.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: SocialShare
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: The platform fosters a collaborative environment where the collective knowledge of the community can be leveraged to troubleshoot and overcome coding challenges.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
